main.name: Hassan Jalloh
main.occupation: Data Scientist | AI Engineer | Virtual Assistant
main.description: Building AI solutions for underrepresented languages & solving real-world problems with data.
main.bio: I am Hassan Jalloh, a dedicated Data Scientist and AI Engineer passionate about leveraging machine learning, NLP, and AI technologies to drive innovation and solve complex problems. I specialize in building culturally relevant AI solutions, particularly for underrepresented languages. I have worked on multiple AI and data science projects, including creating tools for African languages, developing predictive models with 93% accuracy, and leading cross-functional teams to deploy AI-powered solutions. My mission is to build scalable AI-driven applications that foster digital inclusion and positively impact businesses and communities.
main.contactmessage: Let's collaborate to build AI-driven solutions that make a difference!

education.description: Completed a fully funded program focused on statistical analysis, data visualization, machine learning, and AI applications.
Hands-on problem-solving with real-world data science techniques.

work.title: Data Scientist
work.description: Developing AI-powered solutions for African languages, improving digital literacy for 10,000+ users.

work.title: Data Science Intern
work.description: Built predictive models with 93% accuracy, optimized data pipelines, and created data visualizations to enhance decision-making.

testimonials.text: Hassan's work on AI for African languages is groundbreaking. His expertise in NLP and machine learning is truly impressive!
Working with Hassan was a game-changer. His AI solutions helped us improve efficiency and scale our operations.
